    Description
    JSFPhaseListener
    JSFPhaseListener class to add logs at beginning and end of life cycle phases.
    LessonConverter
    LessonConverter class for JSF converter for Lesson.
    LoginController
    LoginController is a lightweight JSF controller which manages the logic of login to the LMS.
    NewStudentSignupController
    NewStudentSignupController is a JSF lightweight controller which manages the logic of new student registering on the LMS.
    StudentAssignmentController
    StudentAssignmentController is a JSF lightweight controller which manages the logic of student working with assignments.
    StudentConverter
    StudentConverter class for JSF converter for Student.
    StudentWelcomeController
    StudentAssignmentController is a JSF lightweight controller which manages the logic of Student welcome page.
    SuccessTimer
    SuccessTimer class to handle timer logic after sign up to display student user created success message.
    TeacherAssignmentController
    TeacherAssignmentController is a JSF lightweight controller which manages the logic of teacher working with assignments.
    TeacherConverter
    TeacherConverter class for JSF converter for Teacher.
    TeacherLessonController
    StudentAssignmentController is a JSF lightweight controller which manages the logic of Teacher working with Lessons.
    TeacherWelcomeController
    TeacherWelcomeController is a JSF lightweight controller which manages the logic of Teacher Welcome page.
